blog.name: theironcan
blog.title: The Iron Can Man
blog.description: "Gods, aliens, other dimensions... I'm just a man in a can. "

summary:
Peter, in the compound's living room: one maca, two maca, three macarana
Tony, walking into this mess:
Peter, not noticing: AYYY...
body:
Peter, in the compound’s living room: one maca, two maca, three macarana

Tony, walking into this mess:

Peter, not noticing: AYYY MACARANA

Tony: what the hell are y-

Peter: ᵂᵒʳᵏᶦⁿᵍ ᵒᵘᵗ

Stephen, who has been watching from a portal: this has been going on for three hours

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: In the After
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2S3l9cw

by 9_of_Clubs

In the After, Shuri lives, rules, fights, loves, and drags herself, her country, and a whole host of foolish men through the end of the world.

In the After, Shuri survives.

–

There’s another moment of hesitation, but then Thor has yanked Steve into their hug and one broken whole shapes itself again.

Nebula and Rocket have vanished.

She stands alone to the side and misses the specters of her own family keenly. Bucky would have rolled his eyes, but felt the prickles of envy, T’Challa would have smiled fondly, pleased at such a reunion, and she’d have draped her arms around them both, grinning, teasing them indiscriminately for being such losers.

We’re with you.

Her chin tilts up.

Up is always better than down.

Words: 9536, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies), Black Panther (2018)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Shuri (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, T'Challa (Marvel), M'Baku (Marvel), Okoye (Marvel), Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Captain Marvel, Peter Parker, Sam Wilson, Avengers Team (MCU), Guardians of the Galaxy Team
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes & Shuri, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Steve Rogers & Shuri, Shuri & T'Challa (Marvel), Shuri and Her Nation, Steve Rogers & Avengers Team, Shuri & Avengers Team, Okoye/Natasha Romanov, Future Stuckony, OT4 Blink and You miss it (but why blink)
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Hurt/Comfort, Black Panther Shuri (Marvel), Shuri is Queen, Bucky and Shuri are BFFs, Steve Rogers Needs a Hug, M'Baku is a Good, Okoye and Shuri are sisters and bosses, Bucky Barnes Recovering, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Fix-It, Angst, Grief/Mourning, Reunions, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Pre Infinity War Wakandan Family, Meetings in the Ancestral Plane, Shuri and Steve spar and cry

blog.name: ask-spideyned
blog.title: SpideyNed!
blog.description: Ask blog for Peter Parker and Ned Leeds. Yes, we are dating :)

body:
Hey guys!

Peter and Ned here! Heres some background info!

  • We’re 17
  • We’ve been dating for a year
  • We’re in our junior year of high school
  • Mj and Liz might make some appearances too!
  • Our asks might be closed for one of us on some days if something comes up
  • Both of our asks are currently open!

blog.name: msktyfantastico412
blog.description: I am a 37 year-old lady doing her best

summary: Turns out Ant-Man and the Wasp found my line for suspension of disbelief in superhero movies. I just watched it again and every...
body:
Turns out Ant-Man and the Wasp found my line for suspension of disbelief in superhero movies. I just watched it again and every time I get more incredulous about Janet and the quantum realm.


  • What has she been eating/drinking for the last 30 years
  • Where did she get that jacket
  • How is her eye make-up still in tact
  • How has she been washing her hair
  • That little plastic hair tie can’t have lasted this whole time so where did she get it
  • HOW IS SHE STILL SANE


I can accept magic and purple plants that give you super powers and the idea that Norse mythology is based on a race of aliens that live on a floating space city but this is too far. If I ever meet Peyton Reed, I’m going to demand answers.

(AND ALSO you can’t just pick up a house or building and move it wherever and whenever you want! What about plumbing? Hank what about the plumbing??)

  • Where did she get that jacket

I can accept magic and purple plants that give you super powers and the idea that Norse mythology is based on a race of aliens that live on a floating space city but this is too far. If I ever meet Peyton Reed, I’m going to demand answers.

summary: Doubt it will help but I might as well ask. Does anyone know how to decorate a half-functioning Milano starship for a holiday...
body:
Doubt it will help but I might as well ask. Does anyone know how to decorate a half-functioning Milano starship for a holiday from a planet it’s never visited?

No? Glad to see I’m not the only one.

summary: "Storm, were you leaving without me? You're my ride!"  "I did not forget."  "I completely forgot." Mr. And Mrs. X #6 (2018)

"I did not forget." 

"I completely forgot.”
